div.p: A CodeSystem to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).
Copyright Statement: Copyright Â© 2016 HL7 UK
This code system https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/STU3/CodeSystem/CareConnect-DeathNotificationStatus-1 defines the following codes:

tr.td: Informal - death notice received via an update from a local NHS Organisation such as GP or Trust
Formal - death notice received from Registrar of Deaths

description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the type of death notice as held on Personal Demographics Service (PDS).

display.value: Informal - death notice received via an update from a local NHS Organisation such as GP or Trust
Formal - death notice received from Registrar of Deaths
